page.title: 07Prestwood - Our future?
page.content: The thing I find living 100 years or more away from whoever you are reading this, is that every day of my life has been different, and I am ten years old. I think it would be good living in Prestwood in 100 yrs. time because there would be many skyscrapers and computers. I wonder who would be Prime Minister, or the King/Queen. And, if they still make them, what would be the price of a Mars bar and a packet of Hubba Bubba? Nowadays Mars bars are 17p and Hubba Bubba 10p a packet. Who knows, they could be 70p and 50p or 5p and 1p. I would like to go to school in 100 yrs from now in 2085. I would probably learn and understand a lot better. And what do {you} think? I will never know. {Penny Robinson}
